pages.text: Created using an $(blood)Alchemy Array$() by combining a $(l:animus:items/reagentboundlessnature)Reagent: Boundless Nature$() with a $(item)Reinforced Slate$(). The reagent must first be forged in the Hellfire Forge.
A bridge between Blood Magic and Botania. This sigil acts as a mana tablet that converts Life Essence into mana, allowing blood mages to power Botania tools and devices.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)LP Cost:$() 50 LP per second when active$(br2)$(bold)Effect:$() Converts LP to mana at a configurable rate (default: 50 LP = 100 mana per second).$(br2)$(bold)Mana Storage:$() Up to 2500 mana$(br2)Shift-right-click to toggle activation. When active, the sigil will continuously convert LP to mana and can power Botania tools and export to mana pools.$(br2)$(bold)Requires Botania to function.$()$(br)
